Name: team_must_be_cross_functional
Description: The team must be of type 'cross-functional'

Name: worker_must_be_available
Description: Only workers with status 'available' can be assigned

Name: feature_must_be_high_priority
Description: Only features with priority 'High' or 'Critical' can be in the first release

Name: sprint_must_be_active
Description: Can only assign tasks to a sprint with status 'planned' or 'active'

Name: user_story_must_have_acceptance_criteria
Description: A User Story must have defined acceptance criteria before being added to a sprint

Name: task_cannot_be_blocked
Description: Do not assign tasks that are currently blocked

Name: scrum_master_must_be_experienced
Description: The Scrum Master should have an experience level above 'Beginner'

Name: sprint_goal_must_be_defined
Description: Every sprint must have a defined goal

Name: budget_must_not_be_exceeded
Description: The total project cost must not exceed the allocated budget

Name: skill_must_match_role
Description: Workers must have skills that match their assigned role's area of responsibility

Name: release_must_include_core_features
Description: The first release must include all features marked as 'Core'
